We are less than two weeks away from the 2nd Annual, Red, White & Bassoon benefit concert!

Join us Friday, August 23 at the HI-FI and enjoy live music from Rock E Bassoon, Progressive Lenses and Howard.

A portion of proceeds will go to the ACLU of Indiana to protect constitutional rights and civil liberties in Indiana and across the country. Tickets are just $25.
